wikipedia_page.main: Ronald Edward Perrin (13 April 1931 – 5 September 1997) was a British cathedral organist.

response: In 1447, the organ at Ripon Cathedral was played by a priest, Thomas Litster. Notable organists have included composers Charles Harry Moody and Ronald Edward Perrin.

link_mentions.page: List of musicians at English cathedrals
response: Notable organists of Ripon Cathedral have included composers Charles Harry Moody and Ronald Edward Perrin.
* 1957–66 Ronald Edward Perrin (later organist of Ripon Cathedral)
